name: Thomas J. RILEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Riley v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Thomas J. RILEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of January, 2002, the appeal is quashed. Sidkoff, Pincus, Greenberg & Green, P.C. v. Pennsylvania National Mutual Casualty Ins. Co., 521 Pa. 462, 555 A.2d 1284 (1989).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
791 A.2d 1152
Thomas J. RILEY, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 154 MAP 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 15, 2002.
